ya10.3.2:5.1: ⇒ Yo cakkhundriyaṃ parijānittha so domanassindriyaṃ pajahitthāti?
ya10.3.2:6.1: ⇐ Yo vā pana domanassindriyaṃ pajahittha so cakkhundriyaṃ parijānitthāti?
ya10.3.2:7.1: Dve puggalā domanassindriyaṃ pajahittha, no ca cakkhundriyaṃ parijānittha.
ya10.3.2:8.1: ⇒ Yo cakkhundriyaṃ parijānittha so anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṃ bhāvitthāti?
ya10.3.2:9.1: ⇐ Yo vā pana anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṃ bhāvittha so cakkhundriyaṃ parijānitthāti?
ya10.3.2:10.1: Cha puggalā anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṃ bhāvittha, no ca cakkhundriyaṃ parijānittha.
ya10.3.2:11.1: ⇒ Yo cakkhundriyaṃ parijānittha so aññindriyaṃ bhāvitthāti?
ya10.3.2:12.1: ⇐ Yo vā pana aññindriyaṃ bhāvittha so cakkhundriyaṃ parijānitthāti?
ya10.3.2:13.1: ⇒ Yo cakkhundriyaṃ parijānittha so aññātāvindriyaṃ sacchikaritthāti?
ya10.3.2:14.1: Yo aggaphalaṃ sacchikaroti so cakkhundriyaṃ parijānittha, no ca aññātāvindriyaṃ sacchikarittha.
ya10.3.2:14.2: Yo aggaphalaṃ sacchākāsi so cakkhundriyañca parijānittha aññātāvindriyañca sacchikarittha.
ya10.3.2:15.1: ⇐ Yo vā pana aññātāvindriyaṃ sacchikarittha so cakkhundriyaṃ parijānitthāti?
ya10.3.2:16.1: ⇒ Yo domanassindriyaṃ pajahittha so anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṃ bhāvitthāti?
ya10.3.2:17.1: ⇐ Yo vā pana anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṃ bhāvittha so domanassindriyaṃ pajahitthāti?
ya10.3.2:18.1: Cattāro puggalā anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṃ bhāvittha, no ca domanassindriyaṃ pajahittha.
ya10.3.2:18.2: Tayo puggalā anaññātaññassāmītindriyañca bhāvittha domanassindriyañca pajahittha.
ya10.3.2:19.1: ⇒ Yo domanassindriyaṃ pajahittha so aññindriyaṃ bhāvitthāti?
ya10.3.2:20.1: Dve puggalā domanassindriyaṃ pajahittha, no ca aññindriyaṃ bhāvittha.
ya10.3.2:21.1: ⇐ Yo vā pana aññindriyaṃ bhāvittha so domanassindriyaṃ pajahitthāti?
ya10.3.2:22.1: ⇒ Yo domanassindriyaṃ pajahittha so aññātāvindriyaṃ sacchikaritthāti?
ya10.3.2:23.1: Tayo puggalā domanassindriyaṃ pajahittha, no ca aññātāvindriyaṃ sacchikarittha.
ya10.3.2:24.1: ⇐ Yo vā pana aññātāvindriyaṃ sacchikarittha so domanassindriyaṃ pajahitthāti?
ya10.3.2:25.1: ⇒ Yo anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṃ bhāvittha so aññindriyaṃ bhāvitthāti?
ya10.3.2:26.1: Cha puggalā anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṃ bhāvittha, no ca aññindriyaṃ bhāvittha.
ya10.3.2:27.1: ⇐ Yo vā pana aññindriyaṃ bhāvittha so anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṃ bhāvitthāti?
ya10.3.2:28.1: ⇒ Yo anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṃ bhāvittha so aññātāvindriyaṃ sacchikaritthāti?
ya10.3.2:29.1: Satta puggalā anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṃ bhāvittha, no ca aññātāvindriyaṃ sacchikarittha.
ya10.3.2:30.1: ⇐ Yo vā pana aññātāvindriyaṃ sacchikarittha so anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṃ bhāvitthāti?
ya10.3.2:31.1: ⇒ Yo aññindriyaṃ bhāvittha so aññātāvindriyaṃ sacchikaritthāti?
ya10.3.2:32.1: Yo aggaphalaṃ sacchikaroti so aññindriyaṃ bhāvittha, no ca aññātāvindriyaṃ sacchikarittha.
ya10.3.2:32.2: Yo aggaphalaṃ sacchākāsi so aññindriyañca bhāvittha aññātāvindriyañca sacchikarittha.
ya10.3.2:33.1: ⇐ Yo vā pana aññātāvindriyaṃ sacchikarittha so aññindriyaṃ bhāvitthāti?
ya10.3.2:35.1: ⇒ Yo cakkhundriyaṃ na parijānittha so domanassindriyaṃ nappajahitthāti?
ya10.3.2:36.1: Dve puggalā cakkhundriyaṃ na parijānittha, no ca domanassindriyaṃ nappajahittha.
ya10.3.2:36.2: Cha puggalā cakkhundriyañca na parijānittha domanassindriyañca nappajahittha.
ya10.3.2:37.1: ⇐ Yo vā pana domanassindriyaṃ nappajahittha so cakkhundriyaṃ na parijānitthāti?
ya10.3.2:38.1: ⇒ Yo cakkhundriyaṃ na parijānittha so anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṃ na bhāvitthāti?
ya10.3.2:39.1: Cha puggalā cakkhundriyaṃ na parijānittha, no ca anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṃ na bhāvittha.
ya10.3.2:39.2: Dve puggalā cakkhundriyañca na parijānittha anaññātaññassāmītindriyañca na bhāvittha.
ya10.3.2:40.1: ⇐ Yo vā pana anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṃ na bhāvittha so cakkhundriyaṃ na parijānitthāti?
ya10.3.2:41.1: ⇒ Yo cakkhundriyaṃ na parijānittha so aññindriyaṃ na bhāvitthāti?
ya10.3.2:42.1: ⇐ Yo vā pana aññindriyaṃ na bhāvittha so cakkhundriyaṃ na parijānitthāti?
ya10.3.2:43.1: ⇒ Yo cakkhundriyaṃ na parijānittha so aññātāvindriyaṃ na sacchikaritthāti?
ya10.3.2:44.1: ⇐ Yo vā pana aññātāvindriyaṃ na sacchikarittha so cakkhundriyaṃ na parijānitthāti?
ya10.3.2:45.1: Yo aggaphalaṃ sacchikaroti so aññātāvindriyaṃ na sacchikarittha, no ca cakkhundriyaṃ na parijānittha.
ya10.3.2:45.2: Aṭṭha puggalā aññātāvindriyañca na sacchikarittha cakkhundriyañca na parijānittha.
ya10.3.2:46.1: ⇒ Yo domanassindriyaṃ nappajahittha so anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṃ na bhāvitthāti?
ya10.3.2:47.1: Cattāro puggalā domanassindriyaṃ nappajahittha, no ca anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṃ na bhāvittha.
ya10.3.2:47.2: Dve puggalā domanassindriyañca nappajahittha anaññātaññassāmītindriyañca na bhāvittha.
ya10.3.2:48.1: ⇐ Yo vā pana anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṃ na bhāvittha so domanassindriyaṃ nappajahitthāti?
ya10.3.2:49.1: ⇒ Yo domanassindriyaṃ nappajahittha so aññindriyaṃ na bhāvitthāti?
ya10.3.2:50.1: ⇐ Yo vā pana aññindriyaṃ na bhāvittha so domanassindriyaṃ nappajahitthāti?
ya10.3.2:51.1: Dve puggalā aññindriyaṃ na bhāvittha, no ca domanassindriyaṃ nappajahittha.
ya10.3.2:51.2: Cha puggalā aññindriyañca na bhāvittha domanassindriyañca nappajahittha.
ya10.3.2:52.1: ⇒ Yo domanassindriyaṃ nappajahittha so aññātāvindriyaṃ na sacchikaritthāti?
ya10.3.2:53.1: ⇐ Yo vā pana aññātāvindriyaṃ na sacchikarittha so domanassindriyaṃ nappajahitthāti?
ya10.3.2:54.1: Tayo puggalā aññātāvindriyaṃ na sacchikarittha, no ca domanassindriyaṃ nappajahittha.
ya10.3.2:54.2: Cha puggalā aññātāvindriyañca na sacchikarittha domanassindriyañca nappajahittha.
ya10.3.2:55.1: ⇒ Yo anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṃ na bhāvittha so aññindriyaṃ na bhāvitthāti?
ya10.3.2:56.1: ⇐ Yo vā pana aññindriyaṃ na bhāvittha so anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṃ na bhāvitthāti?
ya10.3.2:57.1: Cha puggalā aññindriyaṃ na bhāvittha, no ca anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṃ na bhāvittha.
ya10.3.2:57.2: Dve puggalā aññindriyañca na bhāvittha anaññātaññassāmītindriyañca na bhāvittha.
ya10.3.2:58.1: ⇒ Yo anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṃ na bhāvittha so aññātāvindriyaṃ na sacchikaritthāti?
ya10.3.2:59.1: ⇐ Yo vā pana aññātāvindriyaṃ na sacchikarittha so anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṃ na bhāvitthāti?
ya10.3.2:60.1: Satta puggalā aññātāvindriyaṃ na sacchikarittha, no ca anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṃ na bhāvittha.
ya10.3.2:60.2: Dve puggalā aññātāvindriyañca na sacchikarittha anaññātaññassāmītindriyañca na bhāvittha.
ya10.3.2:61.1: ⇒ Yo aññindriyaṃ na bhāvittha so aññātāvindriyaṃ na sacchikaritthāti?
ya10.3.2:62.1: ⇐ Yo vā pana aññātāvindriyaṃ na sacchikarittha so aññindriyaṃ na bhāvitthāti?
ya10.3.2:63.1: Yo aggaphalaṃ sacchikaroti so aññātāvindriyaṃ na sacchikarittha, no ca aññindriyaṃ na bhāvittha.
ya10.3.2:63.2: Aṭṭha puggalā aññātāvindriyañca na sacchikarittha aññindriyañca na bhāvittha.
